name: Peace Seeker
description:
This a a small game we made for a gamejam, where the theme was peace and we came up with this game.

Este proyecto es un juego hecho para una GameJam, la temática era el díaPeace de la paz y se nos ocurrió este juego.

Group was formed by:

-Aaron Morales(Game designer, programer)

- Alejandro Parra(Musica composer, Story writer)

-Pablo Ramblado(Game designer)

-Pablo Meca(Head Programer)
